<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a license pool."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/governance/license-pools/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Only pools with no active assignments can be deleted.
Consider archiving instead for pools with historical data.
